name: mac_spoof
title: MAC Spoof (automated)
author: 0xb0rn3 (oxbv1)
description: Automated MAC spoofer that randomizes the last 3 octets while keeping a locally-administered OUI prefix (02:00:00). Launches one background runner per interface to change MAC every 500ms. Supports start/stop/status, all-up interfaces, and multi-interface lists.

iface.description: Single interface (e.g. eth0) or comma-separated list (e.g. eth0,wlan0). If omitted you will be prompted.

all_up.description: If true, target all interfaces that are UP (ignores loopback). Values: true|false

action.description: Action to perform: start (default), stop, status

dry_run.description: If true, print actions but do not change MACs or spawn background runners
